title: Individual Activity - Which of the taxonomy skills are critical for your career success and why

quizDescription.text:
Purpose of the Activity
The purpose of this activity is to encourage you to dig deeper into what a professional in the computing domain actually does and to help you on a path to establish a successful career path.
